column4: Well, I have an easy question, can I log into the GUI for Ubuntu as Sudo so I dont have to use the terminal to do everything?
Well, i know, but i hate having to type it in the terminal when I want to open a system file to edit it for something
gah.. what the heck is nautilus and how do i use it?
Nautilus is the file manager - Places->Home Folder - that's Nautilus
